title: FS: 1912 Underwood & Underwood Giants National League Pennant Winners with Mathewson
author: Epps

posts.post_title: FS: 1912 Underwood & Underwood Giants National League Pennant Winners with Mathewson
posts.post_content:
For sale is a very beautiful and clean 1912 Underwood & Underwood postcard of the National League Pennant Winning New York Giants with Christy Mathewson and John McGraw. Not too many of these guys out there. The postcard is postally used and there is some writing on the back (I'll get more scans up tomorrow). $575 delivered and insured. PM or email me at [url]eppersmatt@yahoo.com[/url] with any questions or offers.

$530 Delivered and Insured
